title: Ticket #953: Purge backwards compatibility code that predates 7.0
description: Tracking ticket for 7.5 purge of all backward compatibility code that predates 7.0.
remarks:
2009-Nov-16 13:26:21 by matt:
/src/condor_rm.V6/rm.cpp around line 383, code for compatibility with pre-6.3.3

2009-Nov-16 13:43:46 by matt:
/src/condor_starter.V6.1/jic_shadow.cpp around line 677, compatibility with pre 6.3.0 shadow

2009-Nov-16 13:46:02 by matt:
/src/condor_submit.V6/submit.cpp around line 4819, code for compatibility with pre-6.7.11 Schedd and unified grid_resouce syntax

2009-Nov-16 13:47:46 by matt:
/src/condor_submit.V6/submit.cpp around line 5384, code for compatibility with pre-6.7.3 Schedd and VOMS attributes in X509UserProxySubject

2010-Jul-01 05:14:42 by matt:
condor_c++_util/env.cpp 
bool
Env::CondorVersionRequiresV1(CondorVersionInfo const &condor_version)
{
      // Is it earlier than 6.7.15?
   return !condor_version.built_since_version(6,7,15);
}
